card.name: Mindstatic
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 6.

card.name: Haazda Snare Guard
card.text: Whenever Haazda Snare Guard attacks, you may pay W. If you do, tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Give // Take
card.text: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature. -- Remove all +1/+1 counters from target creature you control. Draw that many cards. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Alive // Well
card.text: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield. -- You gain 2 life for each creature you control. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Breaking // Entering
card.text: Target player puts the top eight cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. -- Put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste until end of turn. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Plasm Capture
card.text: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next precombat main phase, add X mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool, where X is that spell’s converted mana cost.

card.name: Progenitor Mimic
card.text: You may have Progenitor Mimic enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield except it gains “At the beginning of your upkeep, if this creature isn’t a token, put a token onto the battlefield that’s a copy of this creature.”

card.name: Ubul Sar Gatekeepers
card.text: Whenever Ubul Sar Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Saruli Gatekeepers
card.text: When Saruli Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, gain 7 life.

card.name: Sunspire Gatekeepers
card.text: When Sunspire Gatekeepers enter the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, put a 2/2 Knight creature token with vigilance onto the battlefield.

card.name: Opal Lake Gatekeepers
card.text: When Opal Lake Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, you may draw a card.

card.name: Smelt-Ward Gatekeepers
card.text: When Smelt-Ward Gatekeepers enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Azorius Cluestone
card.text: T, Add W or U to your mana pool. WU, T, Sacrifice Azorius Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Boros Cluestone
card.text: T, Add R or W to your mana pool. RW, T, Sacrifice Boros Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Dimir Cluestone
card.text: T, Add U or B to your mana pool. UB, T, Sacrifice Dimir Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Golgari Cluestone
card.text: T, Add B or G to your mana pool. BG, T, Sacrifice Golgari Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Gruul Cluestone
card.text: T, Add R or G to your mana pool. RG, T, Sacrifice Gruul Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Izzet Cluestone
card.text: T, Add U or R to your mana pool. UR, T, Sacrifice Izzet Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Orzhov Cluestone
card.text: T, Add W or B to your mana pool. WB, T, Sacrifice Orzhov Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Rakdos Cluestone
card.text: T, Add B or R to your mana pool. BR T, Sacrifice Rakdos Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Selesnya Cluestone
card.text: T, Add G or W to your mana pool. GW, T, Sacrifice Selesnya Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Simic Cluestone
card.text: T, Add G or U to your mana pool. GU, T, Sacrifice Simic Cluestone: Draw a card.

card.name: Possibility Storm
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell from his or her hand, that player exiles it, then exiles cards from the top of his or her library until he or she exiles a card that shares a card type with it. That player may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then he or she puts all cards exiled with Possibility Storm on the bottom of his or her library in a random order.

card.name: Legion's Initiative
card.text: Red creatures you control get +1/+0. White creatures you control get +0/+1. RW, Exile Legion's Initiative: Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next combat, return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control and those creatures gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Deadbridge Chant
card.text: When Deadbridge Chant enters the battlefield, put the top ten cards of your library into your graveyard. At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Nivix Cyclops
card.text: Defender Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Nivix Cyclops gets +3/+0 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Warped Physique
card.text: Target creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Tajic, Blade of the Legion
card.text: Tajic, Blade of the Legion is indestructible. Battalion — Whenever Tajic and at least two other creatures attack, Tajic gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

card.name: Blood Baron of Vizkopa
card.text: Lifelink, protection from white and from black. As long as you have 30 or more life and an opponent has 10 or less life, Blood Baron of Vizkopa gets +6/+6 and has flying.

card.name: Savageborn Hydra
card.text: Double strike Savageborn Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. 1(R/G): Put a +1/+1 counter on Savageborn Hydra. Activate this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.

card.name: Showstopper
card.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "When this creature dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature an opponent controls."

card.name: Varolz, the Scar-Striped
card.text: Each creature card in you graveyard has scavenge. The scavenge cost is equal to its mana cost. (Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to that card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.) Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Varolz, the Scar-Striped.

card.name: Goblin Test Pilot
card.text: Flying T, Goblin Test Pilot deals 2 damage to target creature or player chosen at random.

card.name: Council of the Absolute
card.text: As Council of the Absolute enters the battlefield, name a card other than a creature or a land card. Your opponents can't cast cards with the chosen name. Spells with the chosen name you cast cost 2 less.

card.name: Voice of Resurgence
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn or whenever Voice of Resurgence dies, put a green and white Elemental creature token onto the battlefield with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

card.name: Bred for the Hunt
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Mirko Vosk, Mind Drinker
card.text: Flying Whenever Mirko Vosk, Mind Drinker deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals four land cards, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Rot Farm Skeleton
card.text: Rot Farm Skeleton can't block. 2BG, Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard: Return Rot Farm Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Obzedat's Aid
card.text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Renegade Krasis
card.text: Evolve Whenever Renegade Krasis evolves, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Far // Away
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. -- Target player sacrifices a creature. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Flesh // Blood
card.text: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the power of the exiled card. -- Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Lavinia of the Tenth
card.text: Protection from red When Lavinia of the Tenth enters the battlefield, detain each nonland permanent your opponents control with converted mana cost 4 or less. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

card.name: Teysa, Envoy of Ghosts
card.text: Vigilance, protection from creatures Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, destroy that creature. Put a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Melek, Izzet Paragon
card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may cast the top card of your library if it's an instant or sorcery card. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your library, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Exava, Rakdos Blood Witch
card.text: First strike, haste Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.) Each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has haste.

card.name: Ral Zarek
card.text: +1: Tap target permanent, then untap another target permanent. -2: Ral Zarek deals 3 damage to target creature or player. -7: Flip five coins. Take an extra turn after this one for each coin that comes up heads.

card.name: Master of Cruelties
card.text: First strike, deathtouch Master of Cruelties can only attack alone. Whenever Master of Cruelties attacks a player and isn't blocked, that player's life total becomes 1. Master of Cruelties assigns no combat damage this combat.

card.name: Turn // Burn
card.text: Target Creature loses all abilities and becomes a 0/1 red Weird until end of turn -- Burn deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Fuse (You may cast one or both halve of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Toil // Trouble
card.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.//Trouble deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

card.name: Notion Thief
card.text: Flash If an opponent would draw a card except for the first one he or she draws in each of his or her draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

card.name: Render Silent
card.text: Counter target spell. Its controller can't cast spells this turn.

card.name: Sire of Insanity
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, each player discards his or her hand.

card.name: Deputy of Acquittals
card.text: Flash When Deputy of Acquittals enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its ownder's hand.

card.name: Sin Collector
card.text: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant of sorcery card from it and exile that card.

card.name: Vorel of the Hull Clade
card.text: GU, T: For each counter on target artifact, creature, or land, put another of those counters on that permanent.

card.name: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed
card.text: Vigilance, reach Ruric Thar, the Unbowed attacks each turn if able. Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

card.name: Armed // Dangerous
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains doublestrike until end of turn. -- All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Wear // Tear
card.text: Destroy target artifact. -- Destroy target enchantment. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Zhur-Taa Ancient
card.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.

card.name: Viashino Firstblade
card.text: Haste When Viashino Firstblade enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Advent of the Wurm
card.text: Put a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample onto the battlefield.

card.text: W: Helldagrif gains first strike until end of turn and deals 3 damage to itself. B: Helldagrif gains deathtouch until end of turn. You lose 2 life. R: Helldagrif gets +2/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Maze Sentinel
card.text: Vigilance Multicolored creatures you control have vigilance.

card.name: Renounce the Guilds
card.text: Each player sacrifices a multicolored permanent.

card.name: Uncovered Clues
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Beck // Call
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield this turn, you may draw a card. -- Put 4 1/1 bird tokens onto the battlefield. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Catch // Release
card.text: Gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. -- Each player sacrifices an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, a land and a planeswalker. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Maze's End
card.text: Maze's End enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add 1 to your mana pool. 3,T, Return Maze's End to your hand: Search your library for a Gate Card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. If you control ten or more Gates with different names, you win the game.

card.name: Warleader's Helix
card.text: Warleader's Helix deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.

card.name: Pyrewild Shaman
card.text: Bloodrush - 1R, Discard Pyrewild Shaman: Target attacking creatue gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Pyrewild Shaman is in your graveyard, you may pay 3. If you do, return Pyrewild Shaman to your hand.

card.name: Reap Intellect
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose X non-land cards from among them. Search that player's library, hand and graveyard for cards with the same name as those cards and exile them. Then, that player shuffles his or her library.

card.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control becomes a 4/4 blue and red Dragon, loses all abilities, and gains flying. Overload 3UURR (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
